title: Goat Simulator 3 Directly Play
description:
Gather your herd and go to Goat Simulator 3 a new, completely realistic sandbox on a farm, where you will again have to play as everyoneâ€™s favorite goat. Yes, yes, all over again. Only the scope is now wider other goats run along with Pilgor. You can invite up to three friends to play together locally or online to wreak havoc together and compete in mini-games. And then you can quarrel with them forever. Zero Sievert
A new round of madness is ahead Lick , butt and destroy whatever you want in a vast new world. Kill time in the most aimless way since Goat Simulator We will not explain to you how to play (except in training), but simply give you the opportunity to realize your goat fantasies .

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti or AMD HD 7850
